title: Converse Pro Streets: Berlin
description: From Friedrichshain to Köpenick, Kreuzberg to Neukölln, Berlin is one of the most exciting cities in Europe. To mark the launch of our Pro Streets game on Monday 20 August, we met some of the locals that make the city what it is.
